Member Enumeration Documentation

enum MediaInfo::MediaCodec
 

Media (audio/video) codec

Enumerator:
DefaultCodec  Media Framework should select a suitable/default codec. It is used for recording purposes.
UnknownCodec  Codec is unknown to the MMF.
Mpeg4Sp  MPEG-4SP.
H263Bl  H.263 Baseline.
GsmAmrNb  GSM AMR-NB.
Mpeg4Aac  AAC.
Qcelp  QCELP.
Evrc  EVRC.
Mp3  MP3.
Mpeg4AacPlusV1  AAC-Plus V1 (= AAC+ = HE-AAC = AAC-LC + SBR).
Mpeg4AacPlusV2  AAC-Plus V2 (= AAC++ = Enhanced AAC+ = AAC-LC + SBR + PS).
H264Bp  H.264 Baseline Profile.
EndOfCodecType

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN MediaInfo::AddAudioInfo (  const AudioTrackInfo &  info  ) 
 

Appends an AudioTrackInfo object to the audio info list. This class takes ownership of the passed info object, i.e. this class is responsible for destroying of this object. It must not be destroyed by the application using this method.

Parameters:
info Track info object that has to be appended.
Returns:
TRUE if the object could be appended successfully, FALSE otherwise

BOOLEAN MediaInfo::AddVideoInfo (  const VideoTrackInfo &  info  ) 
 

Appends a VideoTrackInfo object to the video info list. This class takes ownership of the passed info object, i.e. this class is responsible for destroying of this object. It must not be destroyed by the application using this method.

Parameters:
info Track info object that has to be appended.
Returns:
TRUE if the object could be appended successfully, FALSE otherwise.

const MediaInfo::AudioTrackInfo * MediaInfo::GetAudioInfo (  INT  index  )  const
 

Gets the pointer to the AudioTrackInfo object specified by index.

Parameters:
index The index of the info object. Valid values are between 0 and GetAudioInfoCount()-1.
Returns:
The pointer to the object. 0, if the index value is invalid, i.e., is beyond the boundaries of the audio info list, or the list is empty.

INT MediaInfo::GetAudioInfoCount (   )  const [inline]
 

Gets the number of AudioTrackInfo objects in the audio info list.

Returns:
The number of audio tracks.

const ClipInfo& MediaInfo::GetClipInfo (   )  const [inline]
 

Gets the pointer to ClipInfo object

Returns:
The pointer to the clip info object.

const MediaInfo::VideoTrackInfo * MediaInfo::GetVideoInfo (  INT  index  )  const
 

Gets the pointer to the VideoTrackInfo object specified by index.

Parameters:
index The index of the info object. Valid values are between 0 and GetVideoInfoCount()-1.
Returns:
The pointer to the object. 0, if the index value is invalid, i.e., is beyond the boundaries of the video info list, or the list is empty.

INT MediaInfo::GetVideoInfoCount (   )  const [inline]
 

Gets the number of VideoTrackInfo objects in the audio info list.

Returns:
The number of video tracks.

BOOLEAN MediaInfo::SetClipInfo (  ClipInfo &  clip_info  ) 
 

Sets the Clip Information for the file(Valid in case of a Mp3/3gpp file)

Returns:
TRUE if the ClipInformation could be set successfully else FALSE.

UINT8 *  author,
UINT8 *  copyright,
UINT8 *  rating,
UINT8 *  description
) 
 

Sets the Clip Information for the file(Valid in case of only a 3gpp file)
